title: Problem-Based Learning (PBL)-Driven Critical Thinking Training for Enhancing Pharmaceutical Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Team-based problem-solving activities in a mobile environment using digital devices, focusing on enhancing collaborative and critical thinking skills among learners

learning_goals: Learners can identify the causes of patient mortality with over 80% accuracy by applying Root Cause Analysis (RCA) techniques through case analyses of patient deaths.
Learners can identify two or more conflict management strategies through team activities and apply them in actual collaborative situations.
Learners can communicate effectively with team members in a simulated pharmaceutical practice environment and perform problem-solving processes with over 90% participation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
